title: West Elm Website Font
author: lindzaymiller

comments.content: A link would make it easier.

I think it's a combination of **[Gotham (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133839/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Gotham%20-%20Medium&fid=c9f7f5fbf27d0712643cf5d0738ae903&fsize=60&text=Our%20Stores%20%2B%20Community&wrap=2)** and **[Gotham (Book)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133839/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Gotham%20SSm%20-%20Book&fid=0587dcbe4fe8c9763b386df2b78d8232&fsize=48&text=Our%20home%20base%20is%20nestled%20DUMBO%2C%20Brooklyn&wrap=2)**
Not that there’s need, but I can confirm Gotham.
